title: Asia markets trade mixed after Trump revives tariff threat and AI fears hit tech
summary_full: China's central bank on Tuesday keeping its benchmark lending rates unchanged at 3% for the one-year LPR and 3.5% for the five-year LPR.
summary_public: China's central bank on Tuesday keeping its benchmark lending rates unchanged at 3% for the one-year LPR and 3.5% for the five-year LPR.
